description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924; in green ink the head and shoulders of a boy looking directly at the viewer; a wisp of hair stands upright at the top of his head; diagonal lines set closely together cover parts of his forehead, his cheeks, and across a portion of his neck; area around eyes, tip and under the nose, chin, and a portion of the neck are colored in pale pink
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck. Unverstaehlt. Japan.
portfolio: From Plate 8 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté
title: Boy's Head (Self-Portrait), Plate 8 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
